documents.document: @Welshie_Aggie @closhea love Jack's coat. You should ask Humum to buy one for you!

@LawyerHelenN I thought that it was excellent
@andrewplsmith I like the stat, not that Murray was knocked out!
@russellcfuller @BBCTwo thank god for that. Don't think I could cope with another day of having to watch "Game, Set & Mats"!
Really enjoying @TennisPodcast especially the clips from Dan Evans' press conference 🎾👍
@Welshie_Aggie what is Sun puddling?
@Welshie_Aggie naughty Mum. I would keep a closer eye on her from now on. Molly does this to me too 🐱
@Welshie_Aggie I think you should hide when you get home. Or blame the joke on human 1!!
@indi_kitty my cat doesn't like it when I try and work at home & behaves in a similar way.I think that they are trying to tell us something!
@angharadmprice Ffion looks v chilled about the whole situation!

@InTouchGeldards @RhianDavies4 it was such fun. Lovely shot of me with my eyes closed!!
@BeeLafferty I have to say that I think that the skills tests are pretty pointless, it is the signature dish that they judge them on
@BeeLafferty we are a day behind you & Monica's test seemed much easier than Marcus'
@Welshie_Aggie you look a bit scary here!
Excellent first set from #Murray. Hope he can keep it up #ATPFinals https://t.co/b9Pp20Jba8

Really enjoying the #AndyMurray documentary on @bbc5live #WorldNo1
@BeeLafferty no worries, it was a v quick dash in & out. Hope the new job is going well & enjoy Thurs xx
@BeeLafferty was excited to see you on tv.I enjoyed meeting your fundraising team this wk. Don't know about the sleepout, are you involved?
@BeeLafferty I'd have no chance with Molly; you have 4 chances! Also, I saw Llamau on the BBC today on The Newport County players' shirts 😀
@BeeLafferty I really enjoyed the book & am looking forward to seeing it. I bet the real Bob is brilliant x
@BeeLafferty I want to see that film. How was it?

https://t.co/JZGf308vpF really want one of these, *hint,hint* @matthewj137

@Welshie_Aggie it depends if you are a good girl until Christmas 😉. I think it is a mousse rather than a moose! #Mollyhasexpensivetaste
@Welshie_Aggie definitely too soon. I very much doubt that Molly would eat turkey mousse. She is so fussy!! 😂

@Welshie_Aggie slightly hilarious!
